document_data.name: Aglast Thimm
document_data.mainbody:
'''Aglast Thimm''' was a [[wizard]] and a member of the [[Zhentarim]]. He served as a mageling to [[Ruatheene]] and was based in a [[Zhentilar]] camp in the valley of [[Arntethyl]] by the river [[Tesh]].

Previously, Aglast acted as a poisoner for the [[Zhent]]s in various [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] cities until his face became too known.
